content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]
WHERE
    CustomerId = 500000

SELECT
    *
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Index]
WHERE
    CustomerId = 500000

SELECT
    *
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Hash]
WHERE
    CustomerId between 400000 and 400100

SELECT
    *
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Index]
WHERE
    CustomerId between 400000 and 400100

SELECT
    *
FROM
    [wwi_perf].[Sale_Index]
WHERE
    CustomerId between 400000 and 400100
    and StoreId between 2000 and 4000

CREATE INDEX Store_Index on wwi_perf.Sale_Index (StoreId)
